pairs.subject: Urgent: Update Your Payroll Information
pairs.desc: Please click the link to verify your payroll details to avoid delays in your next payment.
pairs.explain: The sender's domain is suspiciously similar to a legitimate one, and it creates a sense of urgency.

pairs.subject: Quarterly Performance Review Schedule
pairs.desc: Your performance review is scheduled for next week. Please check the calendar for details.
pairs.explain: The email is from a legitimate company domain and contains no urgent requests or suspicious links.

pairs.subject: Action Required: Invoice Payment Overdue
pairs.desc: Your invoice is overdue. Please download the attached invoice and process the payment immediately.
pairs.explain: The domain is not recognized, and the attachment could contain malware.

pairs.subject: Team Lunch Invitation
pairs.desc: Join us for a team lunch on Friday! RSVP by Thursday.
pairs.explain: The email is from a recognized domain and contains no suspicious requests or attachments.

pairs.subject: Security Alert: Unusual Login Attempt
pairs.desc: We've detected a login attempt from an unrecognized device. Click here to secure your account.
pairs.explain: The sender's domain is a lookalike, and it prompts the recipient to click a link.

pairs.subject: Monthly IT Maintenance Schedule
pairs.desc: Please be informed of the upcoming IT maintenance scheduled for this weekend.
pairs.explain: The email is from the official IT department and contains no urgent or suspicious requests.

pairs.subject: Congratulations! You've Won a Gift Card!
pairs.desc: You've been selected to receive a $100 gift card! Claim it now by clicking the link.
pairs.explain: The email is from an unrecognized domain and offers an unsolicited prize, which is a common phishing tactic.

pairs.subject: Project Update Meeting
pairs.desc: Let's discuss the project updates in our meeting scheduled for Wednesday.
pairs.explain: The email is from a known company address and pertains to a legitimate work-related meeting.

pairs.subject: Immediate Action Required: Account Verification
pairs.desc: Your account needs verification to prevent suspension. Click here to verify now.
pairs.explain: The domain is suspicious, and it creates urgency to click a link without proper context.

pairs.subject: New Policy Update
pairs.desc: Please review the attached document regarding the new company policy updates.
pairs.explain: The email is from a legitimate department and includes an attachment relevant to company policies.

pairs.subject: Your Account Has Been Compromised
pairs.desc: We suspect your account has been compromised. Please reset your password immediately.
pairs.explain: The sender's domain is not recognized, and the email urges immediate action without verification.

pairs.subject: Weekly Team Check-In
pairs.desc: Reminder for our weekly check-in meeting. Looking forward to your updates!
pairs.explain: The email is from a known address and relates to a regular team meeting with no red flags.

pairs.subject: Important: Update Your Security Settings
pairs.desc: To enhance security, please update your settings by clicking the link below.
pairs.explain: The domain is suspicious, and it requests sensitive actions without proper context.

pairs.subject: Office Supplies Order Confirmation
pairs.desc: Your order for office supplies has been confirmed. Expected delivery is next week.
pairs.explain: The email is from a legitimate company address and contains standard order confirmation details.

pairs.subject: Final Notice: Payment Required
pairs.desc: This is your final notice regarding payment. Please pay immediately to avoid penalties.
pairs.explain: The sender's domain is not recognized, and it uses scare tactics to prompt immediate action.

pairs.subject: Training Session Reminder
pairs.desc: Don't forget about the training session scheduled for Thursday. See you there!
pairs.explain: The email is from a recognized domain and pertains to a scheduled training session.

pairs.subject: Verify Your Email for Security Purposes
pairs.desc: Please verify your email address by clicking the link to ensure your account's security.
pairs.explain: The domain is suspicious, and it requests verification through a link without context.

pairs.subject: Budget Review Meeting Scheduled
pairs.desc: The budget review meeting is scheduled for next Monday. Please prepare your reports.
pairs.explain: The email is from a legitimate finance department and contains relevant meeting information.
